title: Mexico Historic Suites in the Heart of the UNESCO World Heritage City of Zacatecas
description: Nestled in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage city of Zacatecas is the opulent Quinta Real Zacatecas. Built in a restored, 19th-century San Pedro bullfighting ring, now transformed into an eye-catching colonial-style courtyard, this luxury hotel boasts both charming character and exceptional beauty made to reflect the warm hospitality Zacatecas is known for. Take a walk across the paved courtyard and pass the charming, bubbling water fountain before reaching the candelit Botarel bar, a sultry cave-like spaceÂ that's perfect for a romantic date night. When hunger strikes, La Plaza restaurant serves up an exquisite menu of authentic Mexican and international cuisine. Plus, the hotel's convenient downtown location means you'll be mere moments from the historic centre and its fascinating sites, including the Catedral Basilica and the Museo Rafael Coronel.
offer_address: Segunda de Palomares, Zacatecas Centro, 98000 Zacatecas, Zac., Mexico
